### less() {#aec7a7a1abbcf26f495eb5057cb42f311}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool GCNRegPressure::less (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gcnregpressure">GCNRegPressure</a> &amp; O, unsigned MaxOccupancy=std::numeric&#95;limits&lt; unsigned &gt;<a href="#a777faac6be71de27de30acdd1a8f1a4e">::max</a>()) const</>}>
Compares <code>this</code> GCNRegpressure to <code>O</code>, returning true if <code>this</code> is less.

Since GCNRegpressure contains different types of pressures, and due to target-specific pecularities (e.g. we care about occupancy rather than raw register usage), we determine if <code>this</code> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/gcnregpressure">GCNRegPressure</a> is less than <code>O</code> based on the following tiered comparisons (in order order of precedence):
<ul>
<li>Better occupancy</li>
<li>Less spilling (first preference to VGPR spills, then to SGPR spills)</li>
<li>Less tuple register pressure (first preference to VGPR tuples if we determine that SGPR pressure is not important)</li>
<li>Less raw register pressure (first preference to VGPR tuples if we determine that SGPR pressure is not important)</li>
</ul>
